name: englishidioms
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: english idioms
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The "English Idioms" skill is useful for learning some English idioms.
Open the skill by saying "English Idioms".
Then you can say "idioms one" and the skill proposes a random idiom chosen from 10.
You can ask for idioms from 1 to 18.
After hearing the idiom you can repeat it.
If you have repeated it correctly, Alexa responds by saying "Perfect!" she gives an explanation of the idiom in English and tries to say it in Italian with the English pronunciation.
The skill contains some sentences in Italian.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
